definition: the whole night/all through the night
exactly/in good order/whole/complete/entire/in order/orderly/to repair/to mend/to renovate/(coll.) to fix sb/to give sb a hard time/to mess with sb

sentences.english: It rained for a whole night.
sentences.chinese: 雨，滴滴答答的下了一整夜。

sentences.english: She brooded the problem all night.
sentences.chinese: 她一整夜都在思考那個問題。

sentences.english: He sat by the corpse all night, weeping in bitter earnest.
sentences.chinese: 他整夜坐在屍體旁邊，真摯地苦苦悲泣。

sentences.english: The rain rattled on the roof all night, which kept me awake.
sentences.chinese: 整夜雨打屋頂嗒嗒作響，弄得我無法入睡。

sentences.english: He was enthralled by the exciting story.
sentences.chinese: 他被小說迷住了，整夜未眠。

sentences.english: Have you ever spent an evening with an insurance salesman?
sentences.chinese: 你曾經和一個保險推銷員待過一整夜麼？

sentences.english: No, you may keep him out the whole night for me,'' I answered.
sentences.chinese: ‘不會，爲了我你可以讓他整夜待在外面，’我回答。

sentences.english: She sat at her typewriter all night tooling up the final draft.
sentences.chinese: 她整夜坐在打字機帝，校訂成稿。

sentences.english: Because shi shi DE and narration to all throughout the night, so blue home and worry about unceasingly.
sentences.chinese: 因爲仕德和仕筠整夜不歸，所以藍家上下擔心不已。

sentences.english: I could hear the child crying all night outside.
sentences.chinese: 我聽到這個小孩一整夜都在外面哭。

sentences.english: The injured kitten moaned the whole night.
sentences.chinese: 只受傷的小貓整夜地哀號。

sentences.english: The noise robbed me of a good night's sleep.
sentences.chinese: 噪聲使我一整夜都沒睡好。

sentences.english: I failed the test despite studying all night.
sentences.chinese: 儘管整夜學習，我還是考試不及格。

sentences.english: His dizzy revery lasted all night long.
sentences.chinese: 他經過了一整夜的頭暈目眩的苦思。

sentences.english: Slaves were made to work all day and all night by slave-owners.
sentences.chinese: 奴隸們被奴隸主強迫整日整夜工作。

definition: midnight/in the middle of the night
day and night/regardless of the time of day or night
overnight until daybreak (idiom); all night long/day and night
without stopping to sleep or have a rest (idiom)
to toss and turn restlessly (in the bed)
